name: Maze
overview: Maze is a First Person Puzzle Adventure game. Embark on the journey of a young hero from Mazadon, in search of the all knowing Oracle! Solve puzzles, collect coins, dodge enemies and traps, and escape mind blowing labyrinths. Race to the finish with a friend in Multiplayer Mode! Two people can compete by solving mazes, collecting their coins and sending their opponent's finish zone to different areas all while both players are trying to get to their zone first! Go for the highscore in Arcade Mode, a timed mode in which you race through Stages trying to collect all the coins before time runs out!
